mapper.update:
update case_execute_result_${tableSuffix}
plan_result_id = #{planResultId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_no = #{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_timestamp = #{startTimestamp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_timestamp = #{endTimestamp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result_status = #{resultStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
worker_ip = #{workerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result_info = #{resultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
error_step_key = #{errorStepKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
steps = #{steps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `case_execute_result_${tableSuffix}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `plan_result_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `case_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `group_no` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `group_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `start_timestamp` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `end_timestamp` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `result_status` int(11) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1-执行中 2-执行成功（没有发生异常，断言都成功） 200-执行失败（发生异常或断言失败） 190-执行超时，强制结束 100-用户停止', `seq` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `worker_ip` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `result_info` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `error_step_key` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `steps` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `case_result_query_index` (`plan_result_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
